document.full_text: no documented proof exists, but there are suspicions that the cubs-red sox series may have been fixed, largely because the conditions were ripe for a bribe, as they were in 1919.
document.title: whiff of scandal wafts over 1918 world series
lines_and_colors: no documented proof exists, but there are suspicions that the cubs-red sox series may have been fixed, largely because the conditions were ripe for a bribe, as they were in 1919.
